title: Frankolala
author: Frankolala
content: I was going through the topics in this forum and I saw the questions about getting merit from a newbie,I read all the replies and I was confused about a reply. So I want to make clarification if a Jnr member can post with pictures or I must still get the copper membership account before I can post with pictures,because picture speaks better than writing.   Maybe I need to become a member with 10 merits first before I can post with pictures ? DO NOT POST SESC LINKS

comments.author: autumnleaf
comments.created_time: August 20, 2022, 06:11:20 AMLast edit: August 20, 2022, 06:29:19 AM by autumnleaf
comments.body: Being now a Jr. Member, you can post images. See below guidelines:BB code lessons & TutorialsGuideline on posting images (with size adjustments)How to add image, resize image and make image clickableThere are several sites that you can use to upload images but from me imgur.com is the best to use.https://imgur.comhttps://giphy.comhttps://de.imgbb.com/https://postimages.orghttps://epvpimg.com/

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I don't know why you didn't think to try it sooner, OP. The answer to the question of whether a jr member can post pictures could have been found by trying it. Other than that, the readings recommended by autumnleaf and the sites to upload are good.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: You have already reached the junior rank now and can try posting images on the forum and don't need copper membership now.You need to first upload the image on some image hosting site like imgbb or imgur and then copy the BBcode and then paste the link here which will be visible in the form of image in your post.You should give it a shot to understand how it works and you must follow the links above for image readjustment to avoid posting over large size image or you can simply do the following:Code: [img width =200] link here [/img] It will adjust the both width and height accordingly so you can also see it before posting by clicking on the preview button just on the side of post to see how your post will look like.It will work for you.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Don't use images too much if they are unnecessary. People with limited, low bandwidth for their Internet access might get trouble.If images are big, you should resize them before uploading and posting on Bitcointalk. Because if you don't resize first, you can still use width or height option for your image but the image size is the same for loading.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on August 20, 2022, 05:53:40 AM   Maybe I need to become a member with 10 merits first before I can post with pictures ?Honestly No, actually You are now reach the Jr. Member Rank mate you can now upload an image. All you can do is find some useful sites that will help you to post an image and you can access those site given above by our forum mate. But for me only one site I used to post an images here in forum which is Imgur.com because aside from it is easy to use it also you can download it on the phone for easy access.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: You already fulfilled the requirements to upload a picture in this forum. Because you are now a jr member and you can easily post images by using https://imgur.com site.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on August 20, 2022, 05:53:40 AM<snip>Adding bb codes here for images can be done by Junior members. You are now a Junior member, being so, your account is then capable of posting images. You do not need to gain 10 more merits.You can upload images and get their bb codes from different platforms such as imgur and imgbb. From FAQ:QuoteWhy can't I post images?Because you need to be a Junior Member to do that. To become a Junior Member you will have to have posted in three activity periods and have at least 28 activity. However, you can bypass these restriction by buying a Copper Membership for a small fee here.
